nested_items.name: DeviceFleetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the device.

nested_items.name: DeviceFleetName
nested_items.description: The name of the fleet.

nested_items.name: OutputConfig
nested_items.description: The output configuration for storing sample data collected by the fleet.

nested_items.name: S3OutputLocation
nested_items.description: The Amazon Simple Storage (S3) bucker URI.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Key Management Service (Amazon Web Services KMS) key that Amazon SageMaker uses to encrypt data on the storage volume after compilation job. If you don't provide a KMS key ID, Amazon SageMaker uses the default KMS key for Amazon S3 for your role's account.

nested_items.name: PresetDeploymentType
nested_items.description: The deployment type SageMaker Edge Manager will create. Currently only supports Amazon Web Services IoT Greengrass Version 2 components.

nested_items.name: PresetDeploymentConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration used to create deployment artifacts. Specify configuration options with a JSON string. The available configuration options for each type are:
Name of the GreenGrass V2 component. If not specified, the default name generated consists of 'SagemakerEdgeManager' and the name of your SageMaker Edge Manager packaging job.
Description of the component.
The version of the component.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: Description of the fleet.

nested_items.name: ReportGenerated
nested_items.description: Timestamp of when the report was generated.

nested_items.name: DeviceStats
nested_items.description: Status of devices.

nested_items.name: ConnectedDeviceCount
nested_items.description: The number of devices connected with a heartbeat.

nested_items.name: RegisteredDeviceCount
nested_items.description: The number of registered devices.

nested_items.name: AgentVersions
nested_items.description: The versions of Edge Manager agent deployed on the fleet.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: Version of the agent.

nested_items.name: AgentCount
nested_items.description: The number of Edge Manager agents.

nested_items.name: ModelStats
nested_items.description: Status of model on device.

nested_items.name: ModelName
nested_items.description: The name of the model.

nested_items.name: ModelVersion
nested_items.description: The model version.

nested_items.name: OfflineDeviceCount
nested_items.description: The number of devices that have this model version and do not have a heart beat.

nested_items.name: ConnectedDeviceCount
nested_items.description: The number of devices that have this model version and have a heart beat.

nested_items.name: ActiveDeviceCount
nested_items.description: The number of devices that have this model version, a heart beat, and are currently running.

nested_items.name: SamplingDeviceCount
nested_items.description: The number of devices with this model version and are producing sample data.
